storyBlock:
The path is descending and you are full of excitement and joy. You walk for approximately 10 minutes but then you met an dead end and there is no other way. So you realized you had chosen the wrong way. You start to go back to the main road; but suddenly an alarm goes off and several security bots are heading in your direction and their guns are pointed to your head.
► Dash with full speed towards the main road ► Fight back ► Find a place to hide
